kv4.5:5.3: Arahā chahi phassehi, chahi vedanāhi, chahi saññāhi … pe …
kv4.5:6.3: Arahā cakkhunā rūpaṃ passanto sotena saddaṃ suṇāti, ghānena gandhaṃ ghāyati, jivhāya rasaṃ sāyati, kāyena phoṭṭhabbaṃ phusati, manasā dhammaṃ vijānāti … pe …
kv4.5:6.5: manasā dhammaṃ vijānanto cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, sotena saddaṃ suṇāti, ghānena gandhaṃ ghāyati, jivhāya rasaṃ sāyati, kāyena phoṭṭhabbaṃ phusatīti?
kv4.5:7.3: Satataṃ samitaṃ abbokiṇṇaṃ chahi upekkhāhi samannāgato samohito, cha upekkhāyo paccupaṭṭhitāti?
kv4.5:8.6: Hañci arahā chaḷaṅgupekkho, tena vata re vattabbe—
